text: Jack-Jack Attack is a 2005 animated short movie set in the events of The Incredibles. ==Voice cast== *Jason Lee as Buddy Pine / Syndrome *Bud Luckey as Rick Decker ==Plot== Kari, a babysitter is telling about her experience with Jack-Jack Parr to Rick Decker. After she told all of her memories to him, she wished she would forget them. Rick uses a device to wipe her memories. Category:2005 computer-animated movies Category:American animated movies Category:Pixar short movies Category:The Incredibles Category:Movies composed by Michael Giacchino
title: Jack-Jack Attack
